analyzed: ▁eka m añca tu vaṭṭ ana sikkhāpada

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭenti.
Manussā vihāracārikaṁ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ▁manussā ▁vihār a cārik aṃ ▁ āhi ṇḍ antā ▁pass itvā ▁ujjhāy anti ▁khiyyanti ▁vi pā c enti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭessanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
analyzed: ▁kathañhi ▁nāma ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁dve ▁eka m añce ▁tu vaṭṭ essanti ▁seyyathāpi ▁gihi ni yo ▁kām a bhog ini yo ti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: ▁ ass o su ṃ ▁kho ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁tesaṃ ▁manuss ānaṃ ▁ujjhāy antānaṃ ▁kh iy yant ānaṃ ▁vi pā c entā naṃ

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—

analyzed: ▁kathañhi ▁nāma ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁dve ▁eka m añce ▁tu vaṭṭ e s s antīti ▁pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭentī”ti?
kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭessanti.
evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
“Yā pana bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭeyyuṁ, pācittiyan”ti.
ekāya nipannāya aparā nipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
